<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Represents flags for the getelementptr instruction/expression.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The following flags are supported:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">///  &#42; inbounds (implies nusw)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///  &#42; nusw (no unsigned signed wrap)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///  &#42; nuw (no unsigned wrap)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// See LangRef for a description of their semantics.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gepnowrapflags"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">GEPNoWrapFlags &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">  enum : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">    InBoundsFlag = (1 &lt;&lt; 0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal">    NUSWFlag = (1 &lt;&lt; 1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">    NUWFlag = (1 &lt;&lt; 2),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
